email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a fair middle ground. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the laycan is still 15-20 October? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the draft charter party. Everything looks good on our end. We’ll proceed with the agreement. Let’s finalize the details and confirm the fixture. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news. I’ll confirm the fixture with the owner and send you the finalized charter party shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let’s stay in touch for any further updates. Best, Sarah
